email.title: IMC College Clash â€“ Teamfight Tactics
email.text:
Game on! Are you ready to go up against #TFT gamers across Europe? Sign up for IMC College Clash hosted by Team Liquid.
Together with Team Liquid we are hosting IMC College Clash, a university tournament for Teamfight Tactics players across Europe. Sign up now and you may win a custom Secretlab gaming chair.
Join IMC College Clash - a knock-out tournament, hosted by Team Liquid, and win a custom Secretlab gaming chair. Sign up now https://bit.ly/3tmQnhs
